title: JavaScript Fundamentals
description: Master the core concepts of JavaScript programming language. Learn variables, functions, objects, and modern ES6+ features through hands-on exercises.

author.name: Sarah Johnson
author.bio: Senior Frontend Developer with 8+ years of experience

chapters.title: Introduction to JavaScript
chapters.description: Learn what JavaScript is and why it's important

chapters.title: Variables and Data Types
chapters.description: Understanding different data types and variable declarations

chapters.title: Functions and Scope
chapters.description: Creating and using functions, understanding scope

chapters.title: DOM Manipulation
chapters.description: Interacting with web pages using JavaScript
